Text:
Weird.First one of this kind, man, hope it's the last! we all hope for the best from you.

What's also weird is that it checked those 47% procents done from the previous ,,corrupted'' version and started downloading from the beginning( 0.0%) 10 seconds later.


Maybe it'll check those procents in time.Maybe.

However, thanks for letting us know of this second torrent existence.At least you realised your mistake and warned us, lately, but it's better late than never, don't you think?

Good luck, zektorm.
